description.raw:
This pull request adds an `IntrospectionClient` class. Most of the data consumers should use this class as an easier way to create, update or remove filters.

It also provides one function to list the IDs of all the introspection managers running and the items registered in a specific manager.

I recommend to look into the `IntrospectionClient_TEST.cc` for details about how to use the class.

~~Note: this PR is built atop pull request #2121, which should be merged first. [Here](#!/osrf/gazebo/branches/compare/introspection_p2%0Dintrospection_part1#diff)'s a better diff.~~

This pull request adds an IntrospectionClient class. Most of the data consumers should use this class as an easier way to create, update or remove filters.

It also provides one function to list the IDs of all the introspection managers running and the items registered in a specific manager.

I recommend to look into the IntrospectionClient_TEST.cc for details about how to use the class.

Note: this PR is built atop pull request #2121, which should be merged first. Here's a better diff.
